subject: Doping (Sports)
Soccer
Meat
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Mexico’s World Cup players are being barred from eating beef, a move aimed at avoiding positive doping tests from meat contaminated with the performance-enhancing drug clenbuterol.
snippet: Mexico’s World Cup players are being barred from eating beef, a move aimed at avoiding positive doping tests from meat contaminated with the performance-enhancing drug clenbuterol.
